widgets_values:

You can start with this again to expand your video.

nodes.title: LTXV-2 Model Files & Dependencies
widgets_values:
**Diffusion Model**
- [ltx-2-19b-dev_Q4_K_M.gguf](https://huggingface.co/QuantStack/LTX-2-GGUF/blob/main/LTX-2-dev/LTX-2-dev-Q4_K_M.gguf)

**Distilled LoRA**
- [ltx-2-19b-distilled-lora](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/resolve/main/loras/ltx-2-19b-distilled-lora_resized_dynamic_fro09_avg_rank_175_fp8.safetensors)

**Text Encoder**
- [gemma_3_12B_it_fp4_mixed.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/ltx-2/blob/main/split_files/text_encoders/gemma_3_12B_it_fp4_mixed.safetensors)

**Dual CLIP Connector**
- [ltx-2-19b-embeddings_connector_dev_bf16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/resolve/main/text_encoders/ltx-2-19b-embeddings_connector_dev_bf16.safetensors)

**Audio & Video VAE**
- [LTX-2 VAE Folder](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/tree/main/VAE)

**Spatial Upscaler**
- [ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2/blob/main/ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors)

## Model Storage Location

```
üìÇ ComfyUI/

‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-19b-embeddings_connector_dev_bf16.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ gemma_3_12B_it_fp4_mixed.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ lora/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-19b-distilled-lora
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ unet/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ltx-2-19b-dev_Q4_K_M.gguf / ltx-2.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ vae/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ LTX-2 Audio VAE
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ      ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ LTX-2 Video VAE
```

nodes.title: Basic usage
widgets_values:
## Usage

| Usage | (Number key) Shortcuts |
|---|---|
| 1. Set Checkpoints, Clip + VAE | (3) Checkpoint (subgraph) |
| 2. (optional) add LoRAs | (1) Settings, Prompt, Image, Video |
| 3. Enable Featuras you want with the "Features - Switch" | (1) Settings, Prompt, Image, Video |
| 4. Tune any parameter to your liking under "BASIC SETTINGS" | |
| 5. Add images you need | |
| 6. Write your prompts | |
| 7. Generate | |
|Optional: Tune any internal setting | (2) Backend (subgraph) |

nodes.title: Changelog
widgets_values:
## Requirements - [ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite](https://github.com/Kosinkadink/ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite) - [rgthree-comfy](https://github.com/rgthree/rgthree-comfy) - [Comfyui-WhiteRabbit](https://github.com/Artificial-Sweetener/comfyui-WhiteRabbit)
+ *packaging, torchlanc* - [ComfyUI-KJNodes](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-KJNodes) - [ComfyUI-Easy-Use](https://github.com/yolain/ComfyUI-Easy-Use) - [ComfyUI-Frame-Interpolation](https://github.com/Fannovel16/ComfyUI-Frame-Interpolation) - [ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts](https://github.com/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts) - [ComfyUI-GGUF](https://github.com/city96/ComfyUI-GGUF) - [ffmpeg](https://www.ffmpeg.org/) - [Sage Attention](https://github.com/thu-ml/SageAttention) (optional) - [Upscaler model](https://openmodeldb.info/) (optional) --- ## Features - üñºÔ∏è **LTX-2 (Video+Audio)** - üó£Ô∏è **Text-to-Sound** or **Audio file** - üîä **Audio trim** - Automatic audio trim to frame length - üß© **Automatic aspect‚Äëratio calculation and fitting** - ‚ú® **Ultra‚Äëfast, color‚Äëcorrect upscaling** (torchlanc) OR **Upscale with Model** - ü§ù **Video resolution matching** - Fully automatic scaling and resolution calculations - üï† **Length automation** - Fully automatic calculation of frame count - ü´• **Watermark** option - üì¢ **Soundmark** option - üßÆ **Color match** feature - ü™Ñ **Interpolation** feature - üÉè **Last Frame Extraction** - üîñ **Bookmark-Shortcuts** - with number keys --- ## Changes / Fixes - none

nodes.title: Features
widgets_values:
| Feature | Default / Example | Description |
|--------:|------------------:|------------:|
| **Color match** | off | This will try to match the color from the initial image to the samples. The color match algorithms default is set  by default to '0.75'. Feel free to test other strength. |
| **Interpolation** | off | This will interpolate your video to double fps at the end. Interpolated FPS = 2 √ó FPS. |
| **Upscale 2x (fast)** | off | Final resolution = 2 √ó start resolution while maintaining aspect ratio. No morph; color-correct fast lanczos upscale. Low VRAM consumption. |
| **Upscale /w Model (slow)** | off | Final resolution depends on the used upscaler model; Can change/enhance details and high VRAM consumption. |
| **Soundmark** | off | Enable for a soundmark overlay on video. |
| **Watermark** | off | Enable for a watermark overlay on video. |
| **Extract Last Frame** | off | Enable to extract the last frame of the video as image. |
| **SageAttention** | off | Needs to be installed! Possibly accelerates generation. |
| **FP16 accumulation** | on | Adds computational speed and memory efficiency |

nodes.title: BASIC settings
widgets_values:
| Setting | Default / Example | Description | |--------:|------------------:|------------:| | **Seconds** | 5 | Set the desired length of the video in seconds. | | **CRF** | 20, webm, VP9 | Video compression level. Visually lossless. Set on VHS Node.| | **FPS** | 24 | Frames per second for videos. Use 24 for faster motion. | | **Seed** | number + randomize | Random outcome every run. Set a specific seed to reproduce the same outcome. | | **Sage Attention** | disabled | Can be enabled **if installed correctly** to speed-up video generation times. | | **Watermark upload** | none | Here you can upload a watermark image and calibrate the settings to your liking (subgraph). | | **Soundmark upload** | none | Here you can upload a soundmark image and calibrate the settings to your liking (subgraph). | | **Positive prompt** | none | Write your positive prompt!
1) Brief description of the setting/appearance
2) Actions, motions, story
3) Camera composition| | **Negative prompt** | none | Write what you would like to exclude.| | **Checkpoints** | Safetensors/GGUF |Choose the type of Checkpoint to use.| | **VAE** | LTX Audio and Video | You need booth. | | **CLIP** | LTX text encoder | Use your preferred CLIP. | | **Latent Upscaler model** | LTX | The latent upscaler is mandatory. | | **Upscaler model** | any | The optional used model for Upscaling /w model. A downloaded upscaling-model is needed. | | **Audio** | any | The optional audio file for adding a custom audio to the video. |

nodes.title: Video codec, CRF, compression and quality
widgets_values:
| Codec | CRF | Visual impact | Compatibility | Quality and compression |
|----------|-----|-------|-----|-----|
| AV1 | 30 | lossless | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê |
| h265 | 19 | lossless | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê |
| VP9 | 20 | lossless | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê |
| h264 | 19 | lossless | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê | ‚≠ê‚≠ê |


üí° *Tip* For AI-generated videos:
* AV1 (webm) or VP9 (webm) for websites
* AV1 (webm) or h265 (mp4) for local store

nodes.title: Resolution note
widgets_values:
### Automatic scaling and resolution calculation

The initial image will be scaled on optimized math targeting a WAN 2.2 LTX pre-defined scaling.

A cgi anime-style video of a young adult woman with canine teeth, black sclera, gold and blue eyes, pointy ears, white-black hair and maid dress.

She points her index fingers together, smiling shy and getting full blush. She leans a bit forward to the camera and says, with a high pitched cute voice "Please let me serve you, Master!"

nodes.title: Resolution and frame count (automated)
widgets_values:
Width & height settings must be divisible by 32 + 1.
Frame count must be divisible by 8 + 1.

nodes.title: Positive (Prompt)
widgets_values:
A cgi anime-style video of a young adult woman with canine teeth, black sclera, gold and blue eyes, pointy ears, white-black hair and maid dress.

She points her index fingers together, smiling shy and getting full blush. She leans a bit forward to the camera and says, with a high pitched cute voice "Please let me serve you, Master!"
